Texts.Eng: The bone spear has a useful alternate attack. ^orange;Hunters Thrust^reset; counts as bow damage, making it a deadly hunting implement that also causes bleed damage! In turn, you will be able to get more ^green;leather^reset; to craft even more goods!
^orange;Bone^reset; is pretty useful right now. With it, you can fashion weapons and armor. Try making a ^orange;Bone Spear^reset; on your ^orange;anvil^reset;.
